body.name: Bentgo® Stainless Travel Utensil Set - Reusable 3-Piece Silverware Set with Carrying Case, High-Grade Premium Steel, BPA-Free Case, Eco-Friendly - Ideal for Travel, Camping, and Office Use (Sand)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 4 hrs 4 mins
features: HIGH-QUALITY FOOD SAFE MATERIALS: Premium 304 (18/8) grade stainless steel utensils will never rust while the convenient carrying case is non-toxic and 100% BPA-free

SANITIZED AND PORTABLE: Stay safe with your own set of clean utensils and sleek carrying case for eating on-the-go whether at the office, at a restaurant, camping, on vacation, or wherever life takes you
CHIC AND MINIMALIST DESIGN: Our practical and hygienic carrying case keeps all 3 utensils snuggly nested, with a built-in divot to ensure they won’t rattle while in transit
ECO-FRIENDLY AND SUSTAINABLE: Cut back on using single-use plastics and save money with our reusable and dishwasher-safe cutlery

WHAT YOU GET: Reusable fork, knife, spoon, carrying case, and Bentgo’s industry-leading 2-Year Warranty. Our customer support team provides daily quality service and peace of mind to millions worldwide all from a proven brand you can trust.
body.description: Bentgo Stainless Travel Utensil Set makes eating any meal easy, safe, and convenient. The minimalist-designed set comes with an adult-sized fork, spoon, knife, and carrying case. Reusable and dishwasher-safe, these high-quality utensils are made with premium-grade stainless steel and are BPA-free. The sleek and colorful case perfectly nests and prevents the cutlery from rattling while in transit and ensures your bag will stay clean after use. Our perfect reusable silverware for lunch comes in 5 chic colors making it the ideal lunch accessory. Ditch flimsy and unsustainable single-use plastics for an eco-friendly alternative when eating at the office, on vacation, outdoors, or wherever the pursuit of good food takes you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thin But Sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Very portable, lightweight, no blemishes. The utensils are thin and stackable but won’t break on you, and the storage case is also quite sturdy. It is very easy to clean, storage case and all. Can easily fit into your lunchbox or purse, and would be a good choice for when you’re camping or backpacking, as well as for everyday use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed
reviews.reviewText: This travel cutlery set is exactly what I needed. I keep it in my lunch bag. The metal used is strong and durable and they look great. I was worried about the knife not being sharp enough but it is plenty sharp.My only gripe is with the plastic holder. You have to put the utensils in the correct order.Overall worth the buy and I recommend this to friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s a perfect size to fit in a purse, easy to clean, and good quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice traveling/lunch utensil set
reviews.reviewText: I purchased two Bentgo Stainless Travel Utensil Sets. I am very pleased with the quality of the utensils but I believe the carrying case could be of better quality and sturdier since the utensils have a nice weight. I would have rated the sets five stars, if the carrying case reflected this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great travel utensils
reviews.reviewText: I really like these. The spoon is just a little too shallow, but they feel super nice quality (though the spoon had a few blemishes out of box) and stack perfectly into a really thin little container. They're definitely the best travel utensils I've seen personally. I can't speak to the quality of the knife, but I can't imagine it's very effective just looking at it and feeling it. It seems that's pretty common of a design for travel knives. It will work for something simple like buttering toast, though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits perfect in kids lunch bag!!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Wow!! I wish I found the Bentgo travel utensil set sooner. It’s absolutely perfect and the most compact set I’ve found so far. Fits in the STATE Bags Rodgers lunch box with an adult size Bentgo Modern lunchbox. 🫶🏼

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars On the go quality utensils
reviews.reviewText: I like the simple case and the sturdy utensils and I keep them in my vehicles. I don’t worry about drive-through food that sometimes comes without a knife or fork or spoon anymore.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great! please make some for the Classic, too
reviews.reviewText: Honestly these are pretty great. The knife is essentially a butter knife, but the little serrations means it's still reasonably useful for cutting. They stack, they clean easily (they go in the dishwasher with no problem), they nest in their case well, the case clicks closed and stays closed. The spoon is a little shallow, but it's completely usable.The only improvement I would ask for: I wish they made a set like this but that fits in the Bentgo Classic. I would love steel flatwear to fit in the Classic.

The media could not be loaded. Estos cubiertos me parecieron interesantes por lo delgado de su estuche y el material de los mismos. Los cubiertos se sienten pesados y de buena calidad, el estuche es delgado, permite que los cubiertos se mantengan en su lugar (aunque si se escucha el movimiento de los cubiertos)El precio es mayor a otros cubiertos, lo que vale la pena y por lo que se paga es por el diseño y la marca. Serán unos cubiertos que utilice mucho para viajar o llevar en mi bolsa siempre.
It’s very compact and handy, ideal for people who eats at work. It’s made of S/S, yes, but the quality is not at par with the household cutleries that we’re used to, thus, 4 stars.

I wanted to love These, specially cause of the brand. First day a little piece inside the case broke off, the utensils themselves I like the look and feel but I bought for how compact and the case am for work but the case feels so thin and cheap. I’m expecting it to break soon.

reviews.reviewTitle: Arrived with no case in a damaged box!
reviews.reviewText: Damaged box. Not a biggie. But no case for the utensils and an empty wrapper in the box. Returning this!

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice and neat, but a little clickity clackity when closed.
reviews.reviewText: Nice and neat, but a little clickity clackity when closed.
